alert.note: Alert for Latimer (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 04 at 3:55PM CDT until November 04 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL LATIMER COUNTY... At 354 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Yanush, moving northeast at 55 mph. Another severe thunderstorm was near Wilburton, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Wilburton... Damon... Bengal... Yanush... Robbers Cave State Park... Panola... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for southeastern Oklahoma. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
